question: Can you find me the latest news on renewable energy advancements and generate an image of a futuristic wind turbine?
true_answer: Recent advancements in renewable energy include improvements in solar panel efficiency and offshore wind turbine technology. Image of a futuristic wind turbine generated.

steps.content: Can you find me the latest news on renewable energy advancements and generate an image of a futuristic wind turbine?
Plan: 1) Search for the latest news on renewable energy advancements. 2) Generate an image of a futuristic wind turbine. 3) Return the combined results.
Searching for the latest news on renewable energy advancements.
Recent advancements in renewable energy include improvements in solar panel efficiency and offshore wind turbine technology.

Could you elaborate on the improvements in solar panel efficiency?
Plan: 1) Search for detailed information on improvements in solar panel efficiency. 2) Relay the information back.
Searching for detailed information on improvements in solar panel efficiency.
Recent improvements in solar panel efficiency include the development of multi-junction cells and the use of perovskite materials, which have increased the conversion efficiency rates significantly.

Recent advancements in renewable energy include improvements in solar panel efficiency with multi-junction cells and perovskite materials, and offshore wind turbine technology. Image of a futuristic wind turbine generated.
